chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 has a problem:
It's nowhere to be found.
Thank you,

Hi there,

My name is Claudia, Back Market Agent, and I hope you are having an excellent day.

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

I hope you are having an excellent day. Claudia again,

The customer confirmed that the order was received at the collection point. Incident is closed

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Claudia, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Looks like the issue has been resolved. Kindly close the case if no further assistance is required to avoid affecting the KPI of "Long Term Contact Rate". Please click the “close/to enclose” button located at the bottom right. Thank you.

Regards,
RK
